title: 54 Point Car Inspection with Oil Change, Filter Change, and Exterior Valet for £49at SN Autohaus (£139 Value)
highlights:
• Provides extended 24 month warranty for German cars
  • Any 1990-2009 car with engine up to 2000cc
  • Parts, labour, and 1 year warranty
  • Refreshment area, 300 parking spaces, free Wi-Fi
  • Member workshop of the RMI, Good Garage Scheme, working with RAC, AA, and the Motor Industry Code of Practice

title: Charity Concerts in June: SingleTicket Friday 24th (£17.50), Saturday 25th (£16.75), Sunday 26th (£12.50), or SundayFamily Ticket (£40) to Music on the Hill
highlights:
• Friday: Katherine Jenkis and Wynne Evans; Saturday: Mc Fly and Sugarbabes; Sunday: Family Summer Day
  • Proceeds go to Demelza Hospice Care for Children and The Children’s Development Trust
  • Easy transport links from London, Essex, and Kent
  • Hosted by XFM's Dave Berry
